channel.title: Mod Idea for pipelines
channel.description:
Would it be possible to make "transparent" pipelines? Not with any kind of see-trough glass texture, but smth like white/gray, that would pick up the colour of the liquid inside once it's full.
I have no programing skills, therefore no idea if or how to do that. Cheers

item.title: Mod Idea for pipelines
item.dc:creator: @FY-23_7734 Fy 23 7734
item.description:
@FY-23_7734 wrote:

Not with any kind of see-trough glass texture, but smth like white/gray, that would pick up the colour of the liquid inside once it’s full.
